Test Case 1:
============
Enter 1st Decimal Value: 123

Enter 2nd Decimal Value: 436
k 1e 2
closest 2 pwr 64
1.92188
00000000000000000000000 0.84375 22
10000000000000000000000 0.6875 21
11000000000000000000000 0.375 20
11000000000000000000000 0.75 19
11010000000000000000000 0.5 18
11010000000000000000000 1 17

01100001011101100000000000000000



k 2e 0
closest 2 pwr 256
1.70312
00000000000000000000000 0.40625 22
00000000000000000000000 0.8125 21
01000000000000000000000 0.625 20
01100000000000000000000 0.25 19
01100000000000000000000 0.5 18
01100000000000000000000 1 17

01110000010110100000000000000000



0 110000 10 0111101100000000000000000
0 111000 00 0110110100000000000000000

Or for sign 0
-1
5 000000
Subtract k's for regime 010000
Subtract expVals for exponent, check if less than 0 -> shift from regime 010


0 01 10 00100000111000010111011
===================================================


Test Case 2:
============

Enter 2nd Decimal Value: 1234

closest 2 pwr 0.03125
1.6
